ViewProduct(DataInputStream, DataOutputStream, Scanner) - Static method in class Client.Client
Displays the list of available products retrieved from the server.
ViewProducts() - Method in class Server.ClientHandler
Retrieves the available products from the database and sends the product details to the client.
ViewPurchases() - Method in class Server.ClientHandler
Handles viewing purchases for a specific customer.
ViewPurchases(DataInputStream, DataOutputStream, Scanner, Customer) - Static method in class Client.Client
Displays the list of purchases made by a specific customer.
ViewSuggestedProducts() - Method in class Server.ClientHandler
Retrieves and sends a list of suggested products from the database to the client.
